Texts.Chs: 在为这本书着墨之后，这本书引发了无数^red;奇怪的幻象^reset;: 波澜起伏的肉体、^red;多眼的怪物^reset;以及无数其他奇异的事物。这之中最奇怪的是？一个地方，一个地方的名字。我应该调查一下，^orange;德尔塔·弗雷亚II。^reset;它在召唤我。我不得不服从。
Texts.Eng: After inking this book, it has triggered ^red;strange visions^reset; of endless vistas of undulating flesh, ^red;many-eyed abominations^reset; and countless other bizarre things. And most curiously? a place, and a name for that place. I should investigate ^orange;Delta Freya II^reset;. It calls to me. I am compelled to obey.

Texts.Chs: 探索德尔塔·弗雷亚 II
无法用语言来表达疯狂和怪异根植在我的灵魂深处。我的一部分永远地消失在了那个地狱里。
Texts.Eng: There are no words to express the madness and strangeness that tugs now at the very roots of my soul. A piece of myself has been forever lost to that hellish place.
